metadata.title: CVE-2024-23659 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
SPIP before 4.1.14 and 4.2.x before 4.2.8 allows XSS via the name of anuploaded file. This is related to javascript/bigup.js andjavascript/bigup.utils.js.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 4.1.15+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.15+dfsg-1').
